channel.title: Environment Variables error
channel.description:
Ok im new to making servers so sorry for me being stupid
i just did my portforwarding and set up my no.ip.biz when i go under Environment Variables firstly theres no class path file, and in the path file theres what the original statement [system32 etc] under the tut "how to start a server" [top of this thred index page] it gave 2 values you have to place in there.
I made a "Classpath" folder and pasted the what it said should be in there into it, and i deleted what the "Path" files value was and replaced it with what its on the tut, when i did ipconfig, i keep geting that its not recognized as an internal.external command
i serched the comments to see if anyone was having that problem and someone was, and someone said to try doing "ipconfig/all" tired that and still got nothing, i enterd "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;" into it i have "jdk-6u21-windows-i586"
can someone tell me the values i can place into the path file and the classpath files so that i can get my server online?
oh and i was following some really old server guide and i have another old server compiled in the jdk folder how can i remove that and is that whats causing this problem?
also i made a no.ip.biz can you also explain how that works aswell?

oh FML! i though i was under server helps omg, im really soory i have like 70 things open here

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Wrong section for one, download the Environment Variables changer program in the download section.

Read full topic

item.title: Environment Variables error
item.dc:creator: @sone14 sone14
item.description:
@sone14 wrote:

Ok im new to making servers so sorry for me being stupid

i just did my portforwarding and set up my no.ip.biz
when i go under
Environment Variables firstly theres no class path file, and in the path file theres what the original statement [system32 etc] under the tut “how to start a server” [top of this thred index page] it gave 2 values you have to place in there.

I made a “Classpath” folder and pasted the what it said should be in there into it, and i deleted what the “Path” files value was and replaced it with what its on the tut, when i did ipconfig, i keep geting that its not recognized as an internal.external command

i serched the comments to see if anyone was having that problem and someone was, and someone said to try doing “ipconfig/all” tired that and still got nothing, i enterd “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;” into it i have “jdk-6u21-windows-i586”

can someone tell me the values i can place into the path file and the classpath files so that i can get my server online?

oh and i was following some really old server guide and i have another old server compiled in the jdk folder how can i remove that and is that whats causing this problem?

also i made a no.ip.biz can you also explain how that works aswell?

Read full topic
